lead_paragraph: The Nazi DNB agency yesterday quoted the newspaper Corriere della Sera of Milan as saying that bombing reprisals against the United States were "impossible" because of a lack of "cultural" targets. The wireless code transmission was reported by United States Government monitors to the Office of War Information.
abstract: Milan Corriere della Sera holds Axis bombing reprisals against US impossible because of lack of cultural targets
